term.title: activity coefficient

item.text: The activity coefficientfB of a substance B in a liquid or solid mixture containing mole fractions x B,x C, ... of the substances B, C, ... is a dimensionless quantity defined in terms of the chemical potentialµ B of B in the mixture by: R T ln(xB fB)=μB(cd,T,P,x)−μ∗B(cd,T,p) denotes the set of mole fractions x B,x C, ... .
